descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/68920-0-1440056129.gif[/img][img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/68920-0-1440551197.gif[/img]
[size=4]Increase fur volume of animals by Shell Texturing. They become more fluffy.[/size]
(Shell Texturing is one of fur rendering.This can reconstruct fur volume by piling cross sections.)

[size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/5514]SE version[/url][/size]

[size=4]Video[/size]
[youtube]kL9KUHlZtYY[/youtube]
by Hodilton

[size=4]List[/size]
Skeever
Highland Cow
Sabre Cat
Hare
Fox
dog
Wolf
Werewolf
Bear
Deer/Elk

New
Mammoth
Troll
Horse (brown, black, B&w, grey, palomino)
Husky (non-armor)

[size=4]Option[/size]
Kanra

[size=4]What is Fusax2.esp?
[/size]Fix texture mismatch of Bear, HighlandCow, Horse, Skeever.

[size=4]Compatibility[/size]
Shell Models require shell textures(Fur cross section map).
If Retexture/Remodel Mod does not support shell texturing, It is incompatible.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2497805/?][font=Georgia]
[/font][/url][size=4]References
[/size][url=http://developer.download.nvidia.com/SDK/10/direct3d/Source/Fur/doc/FurShellsAndFins.pdf]Fur(Using Shell and Fins)
[/url][url=http://www.xbdev.net/directx3dx/specialX/Fur/]Generating Fur in DirectX or OpenGL Easily[/url] 
[url=http://www.catalinzima.com/xna/tutorials/fur-rendering/]Fur Rendering[/url]
[url=http://research.microsoft.com/en-us/um/people/hoppe/fur.pdf]Real-Time Fur over Arbitrary Surfaces[/url]
[url=http://www.csee.umbc.edu/~olano/635f05/jk3.pdf]Real-Time Fur with Precomputed Radiance Transfer[/url]
[url=http://news.mynavi.jp/column/graphics/032/]Shell Texturing - Fur Shader [/url](Japanese)
author: Vicn
